data_table.description: CT Vertebral Fractures, Offspring and Generation 3 Cohorts 2002 - 2005. Measurements include lumbar vertebral (L2 - L4) fractures as assessed on QCT.

variable.name: CTNI
variable.description: High-sensitivity cardiac troponin I (cTnI)(sample: citrated plasma)
variable.comment: Lowest measurable range: 0.78 pg/mL. Values less than 0.78 pg/mL were set to 0.78 pg/mL. See measurable range indicator CTNI_I to determine the values that fell below the measurable range.
